msg: Wake up watchdog in Apache every 100ms, like we do in IIS.

msg: fix AMQ-1967, server side transport options are now respected, it is possible to configure a broker connector url like tcp://localhost:61617?transport.reuseAddress=true etc

msg: HADOOP-4325. SocketInputStream.read() should return -1 in case EOF.
